Legal_Issue: Whether the Ponce Uribe brothers qualify as persons in need of protection under section 97(1)(b)(ii) of IRPA
Evidence_Type: Threats from Los Zetas, business targeting
Basis_of_Claim: Risk to life due to targeted threats by criminal organization
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Personal nature of risk, state protection, internal flight alternative
Application_Error: RPD failed to adequately analyze personal risk
Review_Outcome: Decision found unreasonable, remitted for reconsideration
Evidence_Ignored: Specific targeting due to business operations
Application_Factor: Nature of threat, gang targeting, individualized risk
Decision_Review_Issue: Was the RPD's assessment of personal risk reasonable?
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient analysis of personal risk and state protection
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to assess evidence of targeted threats
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's interpretation of personal risk
Omission_Type: Failure to analyze personal risk and state protection
